name: QUEST DIAGNOSTICS INCORPORATED
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to innovation, access and affordability of laboratory-based health care modalities in the United States.

Issues related to the promulgation of the Protecting Access to Medicare Act with a focus on ensuring the new reimbursement formulas are in line with beneficiary needs, differentiation in lab-performed tests and general practice guidelines.
Issues related to reform of the Protecting Access to Medicare Act (PAMA) with a focus on ensuring that the data collected to set rates is of the highest integrity.

H.R. 3584 - The Lab Act - focused on issues related to reform of the Protecting Access to Medicare Act (PAMA) with a focus on ensuring that the data collected to set rates is of the highest integrity.

H.R. 3584 - The LAB Act - focused on issues related to reform of the Protecting Access to Medicare Act (PAMA) with a focus on ensuring that the data collected to set rates is of the highest integrity.

H.R. 1865 - Further Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2020 - inclusion of policies regarding data collection from laboratories as dictated by the Protecting Access to Medicare Act (PAMA).

H.R. 3584 - The Lab Act - focused on issues related to reform of the Protecting Access to Medicare Act (PAMA) with a focus on ensuring that the data collected to set rates is of the highest integrity.

H.R. 1865 - Further Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2020 - inclusion of policies regarding data collection from laboratories as dictated by the Protecting Access to Medicare Act (PAMA).

H.R. 3584 - The LAB Act - focused on issues related to reform of the Protecting Access to Medicare Act (PAMA) with a focus on ensuring that the data collected to set rates is of the highest integrity.

Issues related to Administration policies on testing for COVID-19 as well as back to work protocols that include testing. 

H.R. 6800 - The HEROES Act - Issues related to support for the laboratory and health care sectors writ large to allow for rapid response to the fight against COVID-19. 
 

H.R. 6074 - Implementation -  Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriation Act of 2020- Issues related to lab-focused role and response to fighting COVID-19 pandemic. Issues related to the modification of PAMA statute to respond to the health crisis.

H.R. 6201 - Implementation-  Families First Coronavirus Response Act - Issues related to ensuring that the lab-focused capacity and response to fighting the coronavirus are an integral part of the overall federal strategy for keeping the country safe. 

H.R. 748 - The CARES Act - Implementation-  Issues related to support for the laboratory and health care sectors writ large to allow for rapid response to the fight against COVID-19.

H.R. 748 - The CARES Act - Issues related to support for the laboratory and health care sectors writ large to allow for rapid response to the fight against COVID-19.
